title: Session Capture
description: A collection of LOMs and events captured during a certain time frame

ts.description: Start time of this session chunk

sid.description: Unique id identifying the current session

uid.description: Unique id identifying anonymously the current user

loms.description: List of LOMs captured in this session chunk

ee.description: List of exploration events captured in this session chunk

ae.description: List of action events captured in this session chunk

nt.description: List of page load time measures

rt.description: List of page resource load time measures

TimeStamp.description: An instant in time mesured as the number of ellapsed milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC

Dimension.description: Size of a graphical element along an axis

items.description: X coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounds in pixels
Y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the bounds in pixels
Width of the bounds in pixels
Height of the bounds in pixels

Zone.description: Representation of a zone on screen

id.description: Unique ID of this zone in its LOM

b.description: Coordinates of the area occupied by this zone relative to the parent zone

c.description: List of children zones of this zone

NavigationTiming.description: Measure the loading time of a page

ts.description: Instant of this NavigationTiming capture relative to the session chunk timeStamp

ots.description: Timestamp when the page starts loading

its.description: Timestamp where the page is usable but external resources are not loaded

cts.description: Timestamp where the page and all its resources are completely loaded

ets.description: Timestamp of the event that triggered the page change

ilt.description: Elapsed time in seconds to load the page without external files

clt.description: Elapsed time in seconds to load the page with all external files already loaded

from.description: Id of the lom where the triggering event was produced

to.description: Id of the lom where the loading time is analyzed

ResourceTiming.description: Measures the loading time of external resources of the pages.

ts.description: Instant of this ResourceTiming capture relative to the session chunk timeStamp

st.description: First timestamp recorded for the performance entry

re.description: Timestamp after the browser receives the last byte of the resource

et.description: Type of performance metric that this entry represents

Lom.description: Specification of the wireframe of a single Web page

id.description: Unique ID for this LOM in the context of current session

ts.description: Instant of this LOM capture relative to the session chunk timeStamp

t.description: Page title to help identify the LOM

u.description: Page URL to help identify the LOM

r.description: Root zone corresponding to the  HTML body element

LomRef.description: Reference to a LOM previously captured

ts.description: Instant of this LOM capture relative to the session chunk timeStamp

ExplorationEvent.description: Information about an exploration event (mouse move, scrolling, keyboard navigation, ...)

ActionEvent.description: Information about an action event (mouse click, keystroke, drag & drop, ...)
